[Master Spotter (Ranger)](/Feats.aspx?ID=5091) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 220 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Archetype** [Ranger](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=215)

**Prerequisites**
[Ranger Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=5087); expert in Perception

</column>

---

Your proficiency rank in Perception increases to master.
name: Master Spotter (Ranger)
